original_solution_mapping.L1: There were 600 - 240 = <<600-240=360>>360 boys at the beginning of the game.
original_solution_mapping.L4: A total of 90 + 30 = <<90+30=120>>120 people left early.
original_solution_mapping.L5: Therefore, 600 - 120 = <<600-120=480>>480 people remained to see the end of the game.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1031.
    Returns: the number of people who remained to see the end of the game.
    """
    # L1
    total_people_start = 600 # There were 600 people in the stadium
    initial_girls = 240 # 240 girls at the beginning of the game
    initial_boys = total_people_start - initial_girls

    # L2
    boys_left_fraction = Fraction(1, 4) # one-fourth of the boys
    boys_left_early = initial_boys * boys_left_fraction

    # L3
    girls_left_fraction = Fraction(1, 8) # one-eighth of the girls
    girls_left_early = initial_girls * girls_left_fraction

    # L4
    total_people_left_early = boys_left_early + girls_left_early

    # L5
    people_remained = total_people_start - total_people_left_early

    # FA
    answer = people_remained
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: There were {total_people_start} - {initial_girls} = <<{total_people_start}-{initial_girls}={initial_boys}>>{initial_boys} boys at the beginning of the game.
A total of {boys_left_early} + {girls_left_early} = <<{boys_left_early}+{girls_left_early}={total_people_left_early}>>{total_people_left_early} people left early.
Therefore, {total_people_start} - {total_people_left_early} = <<{total_people_start}-{total_people_left_early}={people_remained}>>{people_remained} people remained to see the end of the game.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: There were 600 - 240 = <<600-240=360>>360 boys at the beginning of the game.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: A total of 90 + 1/8 = <<90+1/8=721/8>>721/8 people left early.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L5: Therefore, 600 - 721/8 = <<600-721/8=4079/8>>4079/8 people remained to see the end of the game.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'girls_left_fraction' (value: 1/8) was used instead of 'girls_left_early' (value: 30).
